Text:
This was almost a waste of time and disk space. Consists of 2 CDs. All the girls are at  least passably attractive (Veronica Jett), or gorgeous (Savanna Samson and Brooke Banner). But the sex on CD1 is so tepid it's practically worthless as jack-off material.  Both Veronica Jett and Brooke Banner are non-enthusiastic in their f-cking. And neither do anal.

What saved the download was CD2. 1 - Savanna Samson is gorgeous. 2 - for most of the two scenes she is in she is very enthusiastic, and seems to genuinely like the screwing.  In fact in her second scene, when she get drilled by Mr. Marcus anally (near the very end of the CD) she really gets off; you can see the ''sex flush'' and her nipples harden.  Some of the time she luke warm, but you can see she's trying to get into the sex.

BTW - the 4 male stars are:
Mr. Marcus
Tyler Knight
Tee Reel
Sledge Hammer

Overall I give this 2/5 ''squirts'' (or stars if you prefer).  Now, if someone were to post just the scenes with Savanna I'd bum it up to 3.5 Squirts.

Just my opinion.

this is awful!
just plain awful and good thing that it's free, if I ever buy or rent this CD, it's a rip off of your wallet.
@hardone01's comment on top pretty summaries it all... the only worth material in this CD is only on Disc 2, and that's Savanna. I'm surprised that at her age she has the stamina and pretty enthusiast into doing all the sex scene compared to other performer in Disc 1.

I'll give it a 7/10 stars (yes I prefer stars than squirts) just because of Savanna's performance.
